content: Stocks Discussion Stocks Asked by AnonymousAsked 3w agoDo I need to wait a few days for the Lendlease IPO to show up?I was successfully allocated units for the Lendlease IPO that I applied through DBS but it did not appear on my Vickers account.1 answerAnswerBump0
Answers (1)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Elijah Lee, Independent Financial Advisor at Phillip Securities (Jurong East Lite)Top Contributor (Sep)Level 9. God of WisdomAnswered 3w agoHi, as you applied during IPO, it will show up in your CDP statement.This is because Vickers is a platform that you use to purchase shares. Take for example POEMS, if the transaction does not happen via POEMS, it won't be reflected. So this is probably the same for other brokers as well. If you bought and sold shares on POEMS, Vickers won't know about it, hence it won't show up. The reverse is also true.0 comments6
